content: I was wondering if on Linux it was possible to invoke Lean Interact or the Lean REPL in a sandbox like landrun or firejail or even docker. The use case is that we are taking user-generated natural language, feeding it to an LLM, and then running the generated Lean code, and I suspect that this is capable of arbitrary code execution.
Mathlib CI uses landrun, you should be able to use that for inspiration
I am using the Docker approach to play around with agents for autoformalization here. See in particular the Docker file.
